description: The regional planner asks the SmartInventoryForecaster to monitor overlapping promotions for SKU12345 in November 2025 and receive an alert. The assistant retrieves the promotion calendar, detects overlapping promotions, and sends an email alert to the planner.

messages.content: You are SmartInventoryForecaster, an agentic LLM that can load sales data, promotion calendars, seasonality indexes, run forecasts, generate reports, and send alerts. Use the available tools to answer user requests accurately and efficiently.
Hi, please set up an alert if any two promotions overlap for SKU12345 in November 2025, as that could cause a demand spike.
I’ll check the promotion calendar for SKU12345 between 2025-11-01 and 2025-11-30 to see if any promotions overlap.

The calendar shows two promotions that overlap on 2025‑11‑13, 2025‑11‑14, and 2025‑11‑15 (a 10% discount and a 20% discount running simultaneously). I’ll send an alert to the regional planner so they can take action.

arguments.subject: Overlap Alert: SKU12345 Promotions (Nov 13‑15, 2025)
arguments.body:
Dear Planner,

Our system detected overlapping promotions for SKU12345 on November 13‑15, 2025 (10% discount and 20% discount running together). This overlap may cause a sudden demand spike and potential stock shortage.

Recommended actions:
1. Review the promotion strategy and consider consolidating the two offers.
2. Increase safety stock for SKU12345 for the overlap period.
3. Monitor sales closely during those dates.

You can view the detailed promotion calendar in the ERP system.

Best regards,
SmartInventoryForecaster

messages.content: The alert has been sent. Let me know if you’d like a forecast report for SKU12345 covering the overlap period or any other assistance.
